statements: INSERT INTO recipes (recipe_id, recipe_name, ingredient_list, preparation_steps, difficulty_level, nutrition_info) VALUES (1, 'Spaghetti Carbonara', ARRAY['spaghetti', 'eggs', 'pancetta'], ARRAY['1. Cook spaghetti in boiling water.', '2. Fry pancetta in a pan.', '3. Mix eggs with cooked spaghetti and pancetta.'], 2, 'High in protein and carbohydrates.');

INSERT INTO recipes (recipe_id, recipe_name, ingredient_list, preparation_steps, difficulty_level, nutrition_info) VALUES (2, 'Grilled Salmon', ARRAY['salmon fillet', 'lemon', 'olive oil'], ARRAY['1. Marinate salmon with lemon and olive oil.', '2. Grill the salmon.', '3. Serve hot.'], 3, 'Rich in Omega-3 fatty acids.');

INSERT INTO recipes (recipe_id, recipe_name, ingredient_list, preparation_steps, difficulty_level, nutrition_info) VALUES (3, 'Mushroom Risotto', ARRAY['mushrooms', 'arborio rice', 'vegetable broth'], ARRAY['1. Saute mushrooms in a pan.', '2. Cook arborio rice with vegetable broth.', '3. Mix mushrooms with cooked rice.'], 2, 'Vegetarian and creamy.');

INSERT INTO recipes (recipe_id, recipe_name, ingredient_list, preparation_steps, difficulty_level, nutrition_info) VALUES (4, 'Chicken Stir-Fry', ARRAY['chicken breast', 'bell peppers', 'soy sauce'], ARRAY['1. Stir-fry chicken in a wok.', '2. Add bell peppers and soy sauce.', '3. Serve hot with rice.'], 2, 'Low in fat and high in protein.');

INSERT INTO recipes (recipe_id, recipe_name, ingredient_list, preparation_steps, difficulty_level, nutrition_info) VALUES (5, 'Banana Bread', ARRAY['ripe bananas', 'flour', 'sugar'], ARRAY['1. Mash bananas and mix with flour and sugar.', '2. Bake in oven.', '3. Enjoy as a snack or dessert.'], 1, 'Sweet and satisfying.');
